00028 typedef enum
00029 {
00030   UndefinedCompliance,
00031   NoCompliance = 0x0000,
00032   SVGCompliance = 0x0001,
00033   X11Compliance = 0x0002,
00034   XPMCompliance = 0x0004,
00035   AllCompliance = 0x7fffffff
00036 } ComplianceType;
